mapper.insert: insert into mn_member ( id, name, pass, email, image_name, image_path, image_size, category, image_ori_name, type ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{email}, #{imageName}, #{imagePath}, #{imageSize}, #{category}, #{imageOriName}, #{type} )

insert into mn_member ( id, name, pass, email, image_name, image_path, image_size, category, image_ori_name, type, greetings ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{email}, #{imageName}, #{imagePath}, #{imageSize}, #{category}, #{imageOriName}, #{type}, #{greetings} )
mapper.select: select * from mn_member where email = #{email} and name = #{name}
